alert.note: Alert for Kleberg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 11:02AM CDT until April 23 at 11:45AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Kleberg County in south central Texas... * Until 1145 AM CDT. * At 1102 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles west of Malaquite Beach to 6 miles east of Riviera Beach to near Kenedy County Sheriffs Office, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kingsville, Riviera Beach, Riviera, Ricardo, Malaquite Beach and Loyola Beach. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 696 and 708. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
